name: termnorm-excel
title: TermNorm - AI-Powered Terminology Normalization
shortDescription: An Excel add-in that matches free-form text to standardized database identifiers using cache lookup, fuzzy matching, and LLM research.
longDescription: TermNorm is an AI-powered terminology normalization tool for Microsoft Excel.
It uses a three-tier matching approach: exact cache lookup, fuzzy matching, and LLM-powered research with web scraping.
Features include live cell tracking, configurable column mappings, candidate ranking, and a local Python backend.
